author: Riley de Leon
title: Pinterest CEO launches self-reporting app to help track coronavirus spread
description: Pinterest CEO Ben Silbermann is among the tech executives jumping into the coronavirus response by offering an app to track symptoms and the spread of the pandemic, but privacy issues remain.
content:
Ben Silbermann, co-founder, chairman and CEO of Pinterest, speaks in front of the company's logo at the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), during the company's IPO on April 18, 2019 in New York City.
As the coronavirus crisis continues to escalate, doctors, sci… [+5789 chars]
